TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScrollPattern/ScrollPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HorizontallyScrollable As Boolean
public: property bool HorizontallyScrollable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表示 UI 自动化元素是否可水平滚动。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the UI Automation element can scroll horizontally.

value.span: 如果 UI 自动化元素可水平滚动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the UI Automation element can scroll horizontally; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以是动态的。This property can be dynamic. 例如，UI 自动化元素的内容区域不可能大于当前的可视区域，含义是`false`。For example, the content area of the UI Automation element might not be larger than the current viewable area, meaning is `false`. 但是，重设大小[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素或添加子项可以增加超出可视区域中，指示内容区域的边界是`true`。However, resizing the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or adding child items can increase the bounds of the content area beyond the viewable area, indicating that is `true`. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式从 UI 自动化元素获取，然后使用水平滚动的元素所请求的量。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element and is then used to horizontally scroll the element the requested amount. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#107)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HorizontalScrollPercent As Double
public: property double HorizontalScrollPercent { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前水平滚动位置。

span.span: Gets the current horizontal scroll position.

value.span: 以 UI 自动化元素内总内容区域百分比表示的水平滚动位置。

span.span: The horizontal scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中，获取目标控件从对象传递到检索的可视区域的内容区域中的当前水平和垂直滚动百分比的函数。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1045)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1045)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HorizontalViewSize As Double
public: property double HorizontalViewSize { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前的水平视图大小。

span.span: Gets the current horizontal view size.

value.span: 可视区域的水平大小，以 UI 自动化元素内整个内容区域的百分比表示。

span.span: The horizontal size of the viewable region as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中，获取目标控件从对象传递到检索的总内容区域的百分比形式的可视区域的当前垂直和水平大小的函数。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1055)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1055)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticallyScrollable As Boolean
public: property bool VerticallyScrollable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 检索一个值，该值指示 UI 自动化元素是否可垂直滚动。

span.span: Retrieves a value that indicates whether the UI Automation element can scroll vertically.

value.span: 如果 UI 自动化元素可水平滚动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the UI Automation element can scroll horizontally; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以是动态的。This property can be dynamic. 例如，UI 自动化元素的内容区域不可能大于当前的可视区域，含义是`false`。For example, the content area of the UI Automation element might not be larger than the current viewable area, meaning is `false`. 但是，重设大小[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素或添加子项可以增加超出可视区域中，指示内容区域的边界是`true`。However, resizing the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or adding child items can increase the bounds of the content area beyond the viewable area, indicating that is `true`. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，控件模式从 UI 自动化元素获取，然后将其用于将垂直滚动元素所请求的量。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element and is then used to vertically scroll the element the requested amount. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticalScrollPercent As Double
public: property double VerticalScrollPercent { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前垂直滚动位置。

span.span: Gets the current vertical scroll position.

value.span: 以 UI 自动化元素内总内容区域百分比表示的垂直滚动位置。

span.span: The vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中，获取目标控件从对象传递到检索的可视区域的内容区域中的当前水平和垂直滚动百分比的函数。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1045)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1045](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1045)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VerticalViewSize As Double
public: property double VerticalViewSize { double get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前的垂直视图大小。

span.span: Gets the current vertical view size.

value.span: 可视区域的垂直大小，以 UI 自动化元素内整个内容区域的百分比表示。

span.span: The vertical size of the viewable region as a percentage of the total content area within the UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中，获取目标控件从对象传递到检索的总内容区域的百分比形式的可视区域的当前垂直和水平大小的函数。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#1055)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#1055](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#1055)]
